summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 40th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to McGilvra Boulevard; McGilvra Boulevard, from 40th Avenue North to the north line of Pacific Coast Addition; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6402 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments up on property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds" and declaring an emergency. \~ Sponsor
